## ChangeRequiredExcept type

将除指定属性外的所有属性变为必填

Change all properties except the specified properties to required

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ChangeRequiredExcept<T, K extends keyof T> = Required<Omit<T, K>> & Partial<Pick<T, K>>;
```
